overview:
An Innovator & Mentor by Nature, Technocrat & Entrepreneur by profession (Information, communication, Space Technology), Engineer & Manager by Educational qualification, Above all the Good human being, Contributor in Technology and social sector by providing an innovative solution in area of specially able and illiterate on mobile for communication and educational need- looking for Collaboration partners to take it to the market.

His Mobile application Intiative has been awarded Goldmedal in innovation for year 2009. and has received the various other national and international award nomination. Mr Bipin B Agravat is a nominated for TR35 award for year 2008.

Please contact me for Startup development Venture and Angel investment related activity for Product, Business and Market: Research, Design, Development, Innovation and Business process management, Pitching. He is online on Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Google, Blog etc…

http://www.willager.com http://twitter.com/agravatb http://www.awillager.blogspot.com/ http://www.facebook.com/agravat.b http://www.in.linkedin.com/in/agravatb, http://www.google.com/profiles/108155281157115420550
